practice_phrases: They need to reserve a table
他们需要预订一张桌子
They need to set a good example for others
他们需要为他人树立一个好榜样
They need to make a happy family and work together
他们需要建立幸福家庭并一起工作
If they need to win everything, we couldn't allow that
如果他们需要赢得一切，我们不能允许那样
It doesn't matter what we do, they still need to fight for themselves
我们做什么都不重要，他们仍然需要为自己而战
They would like to reserve the community center
Shouldn't we try to set a good example for the community?
我们不应该试着为社区树立一个好榜样吗？
That's the best way to make a happy community for everyone
那是为每个人建立幸福社区的最好方式
If we could serve the community well, we would make everyone happy
如果我们能很好地为社区服务，我们会让每个人都快乐
Set a good example for the community
为社区树立一个好榜样
Reserve a table for the community
Shouldn't we try to do more for the community?
我们不应该试着为社区做更多吗？
That's the best way to make a happy family for the community
那是为社区建立幸福家庭的最好方式
They still fight with each other instead of working for the community
他们仍然互相打架而不是为社区工作
If we could work for the community, we would lead the way next year
如果我们能为社区工作，我们会在明年领先
They would like to serve the best wine
他们想提供最好的葡萄酒
Shouldn't we try to serve the community better next year?
我们不应该试着在明年更好地为社区服务吗？
That's the best way to serve a happy family at the table
那是在餐桌上为幸福家庭服务的最好方式
If we could serve the community, it doesn't matter what else we do
如果我们能为社区服务，我们做什么其他的都不重要
We need to serve the community
他们很好地为社区服务
They want to serve the community
We should all serve the community
我们都应该为社区服务
They would like to serve the community next year
他们想在明年为社区服务
Shouldn't we try to serve the community better than before?
我们不应该试着比以前更好地为社区服务吗？
That's the best way to serve the community and make everyone happy
那是为社区服务并让每个人都快乐的最好方式
If they still want to serve the community, they need to set a good example
如果他们仍然想为社区服务，他们需要树立一个好榜样
